verses.roman:
raghunātha-bhaṭṭācāryera tāhāṅi milana
prabhu tāṅre kṛpā kari' pāṭhāilā vṛndāvana

synonyms: raghunātha-bhaṭṭācāryera—of Raghunātha Bhaṭṭa; tāhāṅi—there; milana—meeting; prabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅre—to him; kṛpā kari'-showing causeless mercy; pāṭhāilā vṛndāvana—sent to Vṛndāvana.
translation: Also in the Thirteenth Chapter, Raghunātha Bhaṭṭa met Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, who by His causeless mercy sent him to Vṛndāvana.
